key_insights:
The ﬁeld of ﬂuid mechanics is rapidly advancing, driven by unprece-
dented volumes of data from ﬁeld measurements, experiments and large-
scale simulations at multiple spatiotemporal scales

Machine learning
oﬀers a wealth of techniques to extract information from data that
could be translated into knowledge about the underlying ﬂuid me-
chanics

==================================================

The ﬁeld of ﬂuid mechanics is rapidly advancing, driven by unprece- dented volumes of data from ﬁeld measurements, experiments and large- scale simulations at multiple spatiotemporal scales
Machine learning oﬀers a wealth of techniques to extract information from data that could be translated into knowledge about the underlying ﬂuid me- chanics
